definition: stretched out and lying at full length along the ground, render helpless or defenseless
details:
adjective
- stretched out and lying at full length along the ground
= synonyms: flat
- lying face downward
= synonyms: prone
verb
- render helpless or defenseless
= example: render helpless or defenseless
- throw down flat, as on the ground
= example: throw down flat, as on the ground
- get into a prostrate position, as in submission
= synonyms: bow down
